name: Classic Marinara Pasta
steps:
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook according to package directions until al dente.
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add diced onion and saut√© for 3-4 minutes until translucent.
Add minced garlic and red pepper flakes, cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and add oregano and dried basil. Season with salt and pepper.
Simmer sauce for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it thickens slightly.
Drain pasta, reserving 1/2 cup of pasta water.
Add cooked pasta to the sauce along with a splash of pasta water if needed.
Toss everything together and stir in fresh basil.
Serve hot, topped with grated parmesan cheese.
